subtasks.result:
Title: Educate a child on the safe preparation of toast.

Identify and list all potential hazards associated with making toast.

List of potential hazards:
1. Risk of burns from touching hot surfaces like the toaster or toaster oven.
2. Possibility of electric shock if the child tries to insert objects into the toaster.
3. Potential for fire hazard if the toaster is placed near flammable materials.
4. Risk of cuts from handling sharp knives to spread butter or jam on the toast.
5. Chance of choking if the child tries to eat too quickly without properly chewing the toast.

subtasks.title: Explain safety measures
subtasks.description: Explain safety measures to the child to avoid the identified hazards.
